forgot-password.title: Forgot Password | Unionistashop
forgot-password.description: Reset your password for Unionistashop. Enter your email to receive a password reset link and regain access to your account.

client-home.title: Unionistashop | Home
client-home.description: Explore a wide range of unique and personalized products from independent sellers. Find the perfect item for every occasion on UnionistaShop.com, with easy shopping and secure transactions.

admin-home.title: Unionistashop | Admin
admin-home.description: Admin dashboard for managing the website. View, edit, and delete users, manage product listings, and monitor site activity. Ensure smooth operation and user management on UnionistaShop.

admin-users-home.title: Admin | Users
admin-users-home.description: Admin panel for managing users. View, update, and manage user profiles efficiently. Edit user details, adjust roles, and ensure smooth user management on UnionistaShop.

admin-listings-home.title: Admin | Listings
admin-listings-home.description: Admin panel for managing products. View, edit, and manage all product listings. Update details, adjust inventory, and perform bulk actions to ensure seamless product management on UnionistaShop.

admin-settings-home.title: Admin | Settings
admin-settings-home.description: Manage and configure website settings from the admin panel. Customize site preferences, adjust user permissions, and update key configurations on UnionistaShop.

admin-dashboard-home.title: Admin | Dashboard
admin-dashboard-home.description: Admin dashboard providing an overview of key metrics and performance. View charts, statistics, and important data to monitor website activity and performance at a glance on UnionistaShop.

cart-home.title: Unionistashop | Cart
cart-home.description: Review your selected products in the cart before proceeding to checkout. Adjust quantities, remove items, and finalize your purchase for a seamless shopping experience on UnionistaShop.

notifications-home.title: UnionistaShop | Notifications
notifications-home.description: Stay updated with the latest notifications on UnionistaShop. View alerts, messages, and important updates to keep track of your account activities.

privacy-policy-home.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy-home.description: Read the privacy policy of UnionistaShop. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data and information. Your privacy is important to us.
